ValidationRule.description: You need to fill out the RT Number field before moving to certain Statuses
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND( ISCHANGED( Status__c ),
ISBLANK(RT_number__c ),
OR( ISPICKVAL(Status__c, "Awaiting Documentation"),
ISPICKVAL(Status__c, "Awaiting B2B Design"),
ISPICKVAL(Status__c, "Awaiting NRI")
) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please fill out the RT Number field before moving this AL Status
